channel.title: Cant log in on my server
channel.description:
Hi,
If i wanna log in on my server he says: Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "Cancel" then "Start Server" to make your own.
What do i must do?

item.title: Cant log in on my server
item.dc:creator: @Gekke_Mo0n Gekke Mo0n
item.description:
@Gekke_Mo0n wrote:

I try 10 times to log in… But he says bla bla…[br][size=1]Posted on: January 03, 2007, 02:39:24 PM[/size][hr]The comblie.bat file = @echo up
title Compiler
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause and the Runeserver = @echo up
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

Do i need to chamnge something of that?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 03, 2007, 02:42:11 PM[/size][hr]What must i to do?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 03, 2007, 03:02:02 PM[/size][hr]My Runserver gives a error about NPCdrops

Read full topic
